manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shampoo Gently cleanses to help prolong color vibrancy as well as maintain depth, tone, and shine. Conditioner Hair is left soft and detangled with extra shine and depth of color. Deep Treatment Indulgent textures maintain and restore all types of color-treated hair for shiny, vibrant results. Toning Shampoo Neutralizes brass and unwanted warm tones in blonde hair while conditioning and protecting hair from breakage.

How long will my color last between appointments? This product helps salon hair color stay vibrant for up to 20 washes*. *When using the professional products system of Color Last Shampoo and Conditioner. Can it be used on bleached hair? Yes, it can be used on pre-lightened hair. Is this product vegan? Yes, it is vegan. Did the Biolage Professional packaging change? Yes, as of 2022 we have a new look with the same iconic formula. It’s the same great performance you know and love, now with a refreshed look! Are all Biolage Professional products sold on Amazon.com authentic and official? Yes, Amazon.com is an authorized retailer and only sells authentic Biolage Professional products.

Commitment to Sustainability From formulas to packaging, all of our products are produced through responsible manufacturing and green science. Sensorial Experiences Iconic uplifting fragrances act as a meaningful emotional trigger that represents a moment of small indulgence, escape and revitalization. Innovation in Conditioning Biolage was the first brand to introduce a silicone-free conditioning balm and the first to teach stylists the benefits of reverse washing. Cruelty Free All Biolage products are now officially cruelty-free. The brand has been given the Leaping Bunny stamp of approval by Cruelty Free International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Biolage Color Last Conditioner: The Perfect Companion for Vibrant, Color-Treated Hair!
reviews.reviewText: For those who cherish the beauty of color-treated hair, the "Biolage Color Last Conditioner" is a must-have in your hair care routine. This nourishing conditioner is specially crafted to cater to the unique needs of color-treated hair, ensuring that your salon-vibrant color remains stunning for up to 9 weeks.Preserves and Extends Vibrancy:One of the standout benefits of this conditioner is its ability to preserve and extend the life of your color. Say goodbye to fading and dullness – this conditioner works diligently to maintain the vibrancy of your hair color, leaving it looking fresh and salon-worthy for an extended period.Hydration and Shine:In addition to color preservation, the Biolage Color Last Conditioner also offers exceptional hydration. It moisturizes your hair, leaving it soft, detangled, and incredibly lustrous. The result is hair that not only retains its color but also boasts extra shine and depth.Easy to Use:Incorporating this conditioner into your routine is effortless. After washing with the Color Last Shampoo, simply apply it to wet hair and leave it in for 1-3 minutes. Then, rinse thoroughly. It's a quick and effective step that yields remarkable results.Paraben and Silicone-Free, Vegan, and Cruelty-Free:For those who prioritize clean and ethical beauty products, the Biolage Color Last Conditioner ticks all the boxes. It is free of parabens and silicones, making it a safe and responsible choice. Moreover, it's vegan and cruelty-free, aligning with your values.In conclusion, the "Biolage Color Last Conditioner" is a game-changer for anyone who treasures their color-treated hair. With its ability to preserve color vibrancy, provide hydration, and enhance shine, it's the perfect companion for maintaining that salon-fresh look. Make every day a good hair day with Biolage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is one of the best conditioners ever and I love the way it makes my hair feel
reviews.reviewText: Biolage Confitioner for color treated hair is truly one of the best conditioners I’ve ever used. it makes my hair soft at Dang it beautifully and it doesn’t leave my hair greasy which some of them do and in fact, I don’t have to wash my hair for a number of days whereas other shampoos I have to wash every other day. I love this conditioner and have used it for a couple of years now. I highly recommend it. It is worth the cost that you pay for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great conditioner for color treated hair. Smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've used this for years and lately tried something new. I switched back. This tames my grey and makes hair feel soft and managable. I have very thick hair and this is by far the best conditioner I've ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and silky smooth
reviews.reviewText: I tried this conditioner as an alternative to Redkin and I really like it. It smelled great and my hair is really smooth. I have thick hair so sometimes it looks fried because the conditioner doesn’t get to all the hair, but this one spreads well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pair with shampoo to revive bleached hair
reviews.reviewText: I tried both the shampoo and conditioner because they were on sale. I'd been color correcting my blonde hair for months, and my texture was destroyed. I noticed a slight improvement in softness after 1 use, and a tremendous improvement after a few weeks. I highly recommend both- I only rated a 4 because I *really* wish there were fragrance free versions (they smell good- I just generally try to avoid fragrance).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product it does not make your hair feel heavy. The smell is very pleasant. Great for fine hair. Having been using for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this for years. Works great on naturally curly hair to keep from drying out. Added bonus- helps color last longer.
